name: James Carter
summary: Detail-oriented IT Technician with 5+ years of experience in user support and system maintenance. Proven expertise in hardware/software troubleshooting, system upgrades, and preventive maintenance. Skilled in building cross-departmental relationships with 98% user satisfaction rates. CompTIA Network+ and Cisco CCNA certified professional with strong problem-solving abilities.

work_experience.title: Senior IT Technician
work_experience.description: Primary support contact for 500+ users, resolving 90% of tier-1 issues within SLA Implemented standardized troubleshooting protocols reducing ticket resolution time by 35% Performed weekly backups maintaining 99.9% data integrity across 250TB storage Installed/configured endpoint security software across 500+ devices, reducing malware incidents by 75% Documented technical processes adopted company-wide, improving onboarding efficiency by 40%

work_experience.title: IT Support Specialist
work_experience.description: Maintained 100% uptime for campus-wide network supporting 10,000+ daily users Deployed MDM solution managing 2,500+ devices with zero data breach incidents Conducted monthly electrical safety audits achieving 100% compliance rating Automated software deployment processes reducing setup time by 70% Trained 150+ staff members on new systems through individualized coaching

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

projects.name: User Support Knowledge Base
projects.description: Developed internal documentation system for common IT issues
